Params: {1: '1', 3: 'Melinoe sits quietly in the depths of the mine.'}
{3: 'Surrounded by spiderwebs like tattered veils, her gaze is fixed on the path "Aisling" had taken to leave.'}
{3: 'Once again, with her own hands, she has set her child adrift on an uncertain future.'}
{3: 'Melinoe remains silent, having no answer for the yearning in "Aisling\'s" voice.'}
{3: "She lowers her gaze, unable to bear the disappointment in her child's eyes."}
{2: 'Melinoe', 3: 'Liv... They will find this place soon.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Melinoe', 3: 'You were born only recently. Even your power is no match for them now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Melinoe', 3: 'Go find Wheel of Fortune. You know how to find him, right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Melinoe', 3: 'I left something with him. You will know what to do.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Melinoe', 3: "...I can't, Aisling. If we go together, neither of us will escape.", 4: '2'}
{3: "She retracts her sharp claws, her touch gentle as she smooths the child's disheveled hair."}
{2: 'Melinoe', 3: "I'll hold them back for you, so...", 4: '2'}
{3: "Forcing a wan smile, she straightens the child's clothes."}
{2: 'Melinoe', 3: "Watch your step. Don't fall... Just get away from here. As far as you can.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Melinoe', 3: "Don't get caught. Find a place to hide, and then...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'She looks at the small figure, seeing once more the infant she had cradled years back.'}
{2: 'Melinoe', 3: "I couldn't protect her, but at least... I can still protect you.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Flesh has sprouted where it was never meant to; a mechanoid has become a "human\'s" mother.'}
{2: '"Aisling"', 3: "Let's go together. I can protect you...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She gives the child a firm, final push.'}
